committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill entitled "The Public Transportation Energy Conservation Act of 1979".
short_title: Emergency Public Transportation Energy Conservation Act of 1980

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 96-756) Emergency Public Transportation Energy Conservation Act of 1980 - Amends the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to authorize additional appropriations for the discretionary capital grant and loan program.
